entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
